attributes.title: App defects
attributes.review: Unfortunately upon downloading the app my phone crashed without any warning. I have tried to fix the issue with no avail. Unfortunately I had to get rid of the app and find one that is better suited to my needs.

attributes.title: 0 Stars
attributes.review: This app is so bad it should be taken off the App Store. It glitches out my phone so bad and freezes all the time. The app is cluttered and hard to navigate. This app has made my life 100% more complicated since it was downloaded!

attributes.title: This app tried to eat my hamster
attributes.review: This app is terrible. It kept trying to to make me enter my address and said we need to know details about your hamster. My beloved fluffy and I were scared that it was going to take her away and eat her so that is why I hate this app.
